resources.string:
This is a demo project that have been compiled with AspectJ Gradle plugin. 
It allows to write code with AspectJ language in special .aj files and in java-annotation style. 
Full support of Android product flavors and custom variable build types. 
Also supports Kotlin, Groovy, Scala and any other languages that compiles into java bytecode. 
 
Actual version: com.archinamon:android-gradle-aspectj:3.0.3. 
It was completely re-written with brand new Transform API! 
 
Current demo project uses Java, Kotlin and AspectJ together. 
Also Retrolambda, Dagger2 and AndroidAnnotations are in use to grant full compatibility of this plugin with all useful and needed tools! :)
